    mul r0.xy, c12.x, v0

    mad r0, c6, r0.x, r1
    mad r1.x, v0.w, c5.x, v0.z
    add r1.x, r1.x, c5.y

    mad r0, c8, r1.z, r0
    add r0, r0, c9

    dp3 r2.x, r3, c6

    mul r3.xy, c12.y, v1
    mov r3.zw, c5

    add r1.xy, r1, c15.x
    mul o3.xy, r1, c13
    mul r1.xyz, r3.yzxw, r5.zxyw

    dp3 r1.x, r1, r4
    slt r1.y, -r1.x, r1.x

    mul r1.xy, r1, c12.zwzw

    mad r2.xy, c7.xzzw, r5.y, r2

    mul r1, r0.y, c1
